title: Lesson 43
paragraph: Identity and profile define individuals and groups. Determining characteristics, blending attributes, and ensuring equality maintain a clear representation.

words.meaning: a description of qualities or characteristics
words.example: The candidate updated her professional profile online.
The colors blend beautifully in the painting.
The dish consists of vegetables and rice.
Expenses are claimable under the new policy.

words.japaneseMeaning: 決定する、明らかにする
words.example: Tests will determine the student's level.
Youth are encouraged to participate in sports.
The fusion of music genres created a new style.
The project is financeable with proper documentation.
Gender equality is a fundamental right.
Some animals are becoming habitatless due to deforestation.
